description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the underlying questions.

identifier.description: A business identifier assigned to a particular completed (or partially completed) questionnaire.

questionnaire.description: Indicates the Questionnaire resource that defines the form for which answers are being provided.

status.description: The lifecycle status of the questionnaire response as a whole.

subject.description: The subject of the questionnaire response.  This could be a patient, organization, practitioner, device, etc.  This is who/what the answers apply to, but is not necessarily the source of information.

author.description: Person who received the answers to the questions in the QuestionnaireResponse and recorded them in the system.

authored.description: The date and/or time that this version of the questionnaire response was authored.

source.description: The person who answered the questions about the subject.

encounter.description: Encounter during which this set of questionnaire response were collected. When there were multiple encounters, this is the one considered most relevant to the context of the answers.

item.description: Corresponds to a group or question item from the original questionnaire.

allOf.description: A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the underlying questions.

linkId.description: Identifies the item from the Questionnaire that corresponds to this item in the QuestionnaireResponse resource.

text.description: Text that is displayed above the contents of the group or as the text of the question being answered.

subject.description: More specific subject this section's answers are about, details the subject given in QuestionnaireResponse.

answer.description: The respondent's answer(s) to the question.

item.description: Questions or sub-groups nested beneath a question or group.

allOf.description: A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the underlying questions.

valueBoolean.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueDecimal.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueInteger.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueDate.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueDateTime.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueInstant.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueTime.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueString.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueUri.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueAttachment.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueCoding.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueQuantity.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

valueReference.description: The answer (or one of the answers) provided by the respondent to the question.

item.description: Nested groups and/or questions found within this particular answer.
